attributes.additional_details: Improve peoples journeys on the road, people waste less time driving.
attributes.background: Change of speed limit would make journey times less therefore less cars on the road at one time, less traffic more efficiency. Cars have improved all round since the speed limit of 70 mph was introduced in 1965 making them a lot safer.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Your petition calls on the Government to review the national speed limit, but it is clear that what you want the Government to do is increase the national speed limit, although it is not clear by how much.

If you want the Government to increase the national speed limit, you could start a new petition requesting this, but it would need to be clear by how much. If you want the Government to review the national speed limit, we could accept a petition requesting this, but it couldn't assume the outcome of any review.
